title: NFC East MVP, NFL's Best Triplets, Aaron Rodgers, Interviews with Calvin Johnson, Deion Branch
itunes:title: NFC East MVP, NFL's Best Triplets, Aaron Rodgers, Interviews with Calvin Johnson, Deion Branch
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt go down memory lane during Nate Burleson's final show. The crew break down who is more valuable to their NFC East teams, Saquon Barkley to the New York Giants or Dak Prescott for the Dallas Cowboys. Hall of Fame wide receiver Calvin Johnson and Super Bowl MVP Deion Branch join the show for live interviews with Kay, Nate, Peter and Kyle. The crew previews the biggest matchups ahead of the final week of preseason games, including what to expect from Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes against the Minnesota Vikings and Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers against the Buffalo Bills. The hosts tackle a range of topics including the which set of NFL triple threats will be the most exciting to watch during the 2021 NFL season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
